title: An Act to promote victim service funding

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Montigny, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1413) of Mark C. Montigny for legislation to promote the victim service fund with revenues received by the commonwealth from public and private sources as gifts, grants and donations.  Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery

related_entities.name: committee on Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery

actions.description: Discharged to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/21/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on Senate Ways and Means
the committee on Senate Ways and Means
